TO* All NAEB Directors and Officers
FROM* Richard B« Hull
May I suggest that all of you send a word of
congratulations on the formal opening of BUR-FM at
Boston University? This station opened on March 1st.
It would be my suggestion to send your comments to the
president of the institution with copies to Sam Gould.
The president*s name is Dr. Daniel L. Marsh. May I
also suggest you use your own letterhead so that there
are a variety of comments which come before the President's
attention?
